attributes.action: Call a General Election if the PM leaves his/her post between terms of office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A peculiar anomaly exists within our democratic structure whereby once the current incumbent leaves the post, a PM unelected by the people can take over. In extreme circumstances this could be used to oust the current leader and instigate one with designs on altering the democratic freedom of the UK.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
